commit message: Rename to version 0.2.

Implement endpos group for folder filter.
For artist filter: fix album not shown if same album following with different artist.
Add original svg icons.

Create Rows class that takes song listview algos from MusicService.
Rename Item classes to Row.
First throw of foldable group. Work in progress.

Add parent attribute to Row.
Add selected attribute to RowGroup.
Foldable group ok.
When group is folded, show number of songs contains by the group.
Fix sub group folded state not updated when upper group is folded.
Add a screenshot.
Fix screenshot not shown.
Add a menu action that fold everything.
Fix scroll to group position of the song if unfolded.

Add unfold menu action.
Add fold/unfold menu icons.

Add fold/unfold menu icons SVG source.
Do not scroll to curr song when fold unfold group.
Add f-droid and donate.
Fix typos.
Song has constant height, cur_play icon recenter vertically.
Bacground of RowGroupFolder is darkgrey.
Fix crash when foldername is empty. Add slash at the end of default music path.
Add GPLv3 license to every source file.

Scroll put cur song at the middle of the screen.
Fix scroll to bad pos at startup.
Put transparency to Row's background in order to see the click highlighted.

Tap on the left of a group to play the first song it contains or unfolded the group.
Tap on the right of a group to fold / unfold it
Duration view cosmetic.
Rescan media disabled from kitkat.
Highlight duration background onclick.
Reput enable_shake in settings to avoid user confusion.
Add settings fold choice: on startup, groups are folded or unfolded.
Fix song duration not highlighted on click.

Add help preference screen.
Put about in separate preference screen. Add donate preference button.
Some info in readme and todo.
Change version to 0.3
